pages.title: 我的朋友们
pages.text: 各位大佬想交换友链的话可以在下方留言，必须要有名称、头像链接、和至少一个标签哦～ 名称： xaoxuu’s blog头像： https://img.vim-cn.com/76/c339fd7092750f472da9ad17bd7c0081a1f0e2.jpg网址： https://xaoxuu.com/blog/标签： iOS

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 如何搭建基于Hexo的独立博客
posts.text: 这是预览 exseek g.4 workflowmethods构建原始表达矩阵quality control（质量控制） tool：fastqcTrimming adaptor（去除adaptor） tool：cutadapt paras： -a AGATCGGAAGAGCACACGTCTGAACTCCAGTCAC -m 16 -q 30 –trim-nsequential mapping tool：bowtie2、samtools、 rsem-tbam2gbam paras： -p 4 –sensitive-local –norc –no-unal mapping with order：rRNA, miRNA, piRNA, Y_RNA, srpRNA, tRNA,snRNA, snoRNA, lncRNA, mRNA, tucp, human genomefeature count tool： featureCounts para：-t exon -g transcript_id -s 1merge expression matrix of 5 samples 需要和实验室构建的表达矩阵进行相关性的分析，看看同学们构建的表达矩阵是不是正确的 Preprocessing of raw expression matrixfilter（过滤低质量的样本）基于不同RNA类型reads的比例制定了一套标准用于对样本进行质量控制 标准： sequencing depth,rRNA content, the proportion of reads mapped to transcriptome and genomenormalization（对测序深度标准化）methods: Counts per Million (CPM) —>python Counts per Million with miRNA and piRNA removed —>python Internal Reference Genes—>R Relative Log Expression (RLE) normalization—>R Trimmed Mean of M-values (TMM) normalization—>R SCnorm—>Rimputation（补全低表达的基因） package： Scimputeremove batch effect（去除批次效应） packages： RUVSeq、ComBat 评估预处理得到的矩阵评估不同的标准化方法distribution of counts in each sample—>boxplot 参考文献log2 scaled variance of each feature among samples—>boxplot 参考文献RLE plot 参考文献 实现步骤： log2 scaled expression matrix median of scaled counts in each gene was subtracted from matrxi in each samples, all of the expression level deviate from the median in this row was visualized via boxplotMedian regression tools： stats_models in python quantify the relationship between sequencing depth and counts for transcripts with various level 参考文献评估不同的标准化方法Hierarchical clustering 参考文献 package：scipy tSNE plot、QC plot、RLE plot 识别未比对上的reads来源resultsmapping and sample QCpearson correlationmapped reads distribution（total & each sample） line plotmapped reads distribution（RNA type & each sample） line plot pie plot stacked bar plotmapped read number variation in all sample （all sample & violin plot） filter with given criteriontSNE plot of raw expression matrixRNA isolation batchlibrary preparation day batchgel cut selection day batchcancer type batchnormalizationexpression level corr with sequencing depthimputationafter normalization with TMM package：SCimpute remove batch effectvisulization batch effecttSNEhierarchical clusteringRLE plotQC plotremove batch effectRUVs function (in RUVseq package)Combat function (in sva package)visualization batch effect again to get best paraRLE plot to verify normalization methds can 减轻batch effectAnalysis of Unmapped Readsdiscussionevaluation of different normalization strategiesThe Necessity of Remove Batch Effect After NormalizationThe Sequence of Filtering, Imputation, Normalization, and Removing Batch EffectThe Origination of Unmapped ReadsConclusion
